Title: Cartier Panthere Small Diamond Stainless Steel Bracelet Quartz Watch 22MM #1320
Description: Cartier Panthere Small Diamond Stainless Steel Bracelet Quartz Watch 22MM #1320 Genuine pre-owned Cartier Panthere Small Stainless Steel watch with  aftermarket diamonds. The case is a square shape and measures 22mm x 22mm (not including crown) with a quartz battery movement. The watch contains 198 round brilliant cut diamonds set on the case and bracelet. The diamonds are set aftermarket and rate I1-SI2 clarity and H-I in color. It has an off-white dial, blue sword-shaped hands and black roman numerals. Double hidden deployment clasp on stainless steel polished link bracelet measuring 12MM. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal and blue cabochon set in crown. The watch has been fully serviced, runs great and in excellent condition. Fits size 7" wrist or smaller with removable links. One year warrantyDoes not come with original Cartier box or papersAsking $5,500Please make us your best offer! <a style="text-decoration:none" href="http://mostpopular.sellathon.com/?id=AC556745"><im... src="http://www.sellathon.com/Resources/Images/counterc... border="0"> We Guarantee Every Timepiece is 100% Genuine and Authentic Every watch is authenticated by our on-site Trained and Certified Cartier Watch Technician.
